Blackfang: Well... Cybertron is a lot more technological than Earth. 
There are metallic cities all over it, and there is always someone 
doing something at any time of the day.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nighlight::
> 
> Nightlight followed him and said "Tell me more about our planet, is 
> it like this?"
> 
>

> > Blackfang: All right then. I think the bridge can be a good spot 
to 
> > start with. I just hope everything has been repaired.
> >
